# id: ParentContextCloserApplicationListener -> protected ContextCloserListener createContextCloserListener( 			ConfigurableApplicationContext child)
commentText: Subclasses may override to create their own subclass of ContextCloserListener. This_still enforces the use of a weak reference._@param child the child context_@return the {@link ContextCloserListener} to use
codeText: protected ContextCloserListener createContextCloserListener(_			ConfigurableApplicationContext child) {_		return new ContextCloserListener(child)__	}
